---
title: "distance_to_center"
output: html_document
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r cars}
data = read.csv('../map-visualization/result.csv')
data$center_x = rep(0)
data$center_y = rep(0)
data$center_x[data$type == "orig"] = rep(563)
data$center_y[data$type == "orig"] = rep(310)
data$center_x[data$type == "moved"] = rep(592)
data$center_y[data$type == "moved"] = rep(230)
data$dist_to_center = sqrt((data$x - data$center_x)^2 + (data$y - data$center_y)^2)
```

```{r}
ggplot(data, aes(month, dist_to_center)) + 
  geom_line(aes(linetype = type)) +
  labs(y = "Distance", x = "Month", color = "Type\n") +
  theme(plot.title = element_text(hjust = 0.5)) +
  theme(plot.margin = unit(c(0,0,0,0), "cm")) +
  theme_minimal()
```

## Including Plots

You can also embed plots, for example:

```{r pressure, echo=FALSE}
plot(pressure)
```

Note that the `echo = FALSE` parameter was added to the code chunk to prevent printing of the R code that generated the plot.
